title: Private Entrance, BBQ & Picnic Area, No Security Deposit Required
posting_body: ['Top Rated Apartment Community by <URL>, Cambridge House Apartment’s plush, landscaped courtyard with community pool, walking path, sundeck, shuffleboard, barbecues and picnic tables welcomes residents with the perfect environment to call “home”.', 'Each apartment offers spacious floor plans, beautiful views of the courtyard and private entry.', 'Tucked away off Van Dyke Road we offer great location with the quiet enjoyment of neighborhood living.', 'We would love for you to come on by and see what Cambridge House has to offer!', '-Online Payment Options (Credit Card, Debit Card and ACH)', '-Laundry Facility', '-Club House', '-One $35 Application Fee Per Apartment, Not Per Person', '-Package Acceptance', '-Upgraded Units Available', '-Sparkling Clean Swimming Pool', '-No Security Deposit Required', '-Additional Storage', '-Late Fee Forgiveness', '-BBQ & Picnic Area', '-Private Entrance', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', 'Pricing and availability are subject to change.']
